message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to own a valuable asset that can bring significant benefits to your business or personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the potential it holds.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a fair deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the market value, but I believe the product's unique features and benefits justify a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $825000 is a more reasonable price considering the product's value. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go below $825000.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I understand that the product has unique features and benefits, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think $775000 is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go above $775000.
